game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the ancient temple and retrieve the stolen artifact.
game.description: A powerful artifact has been stolen from the village, and it's believed to be hidden in an ancient temple deep within the forest. Retrieve the artifact and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a magical amulet

task.objective: Speak with the village wise woman about the temple's location.
task.description: She will provide you with information about the temple's location and any potential dangers within.

task.objective: Travel to the ancient forest and find the entrance to the temple.
task.description: Be cautious of traps and wild beasts while navigating through the dense foliage.

task.objective: Navigate the treacherous tunnels within the temple and reach the artifact chamber.
task.description: Beware of falling rocks, spiked traps, and other hazards that may impede your progress.
